      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      m_Matrix3 m_Matrix3.idt()
      Sets this matrix to the identity matrix
      m_Matrix3 m_Matrix3.inv()
      Inverts this matrix given that the determinant is != 0

      Multiplies this matrix with the other matrix in the order this * m.
      m_Matrix3 m_Matrix3.set(float... values)
      Sets the matrix to the given matrix as a float array.
      m_Matrix3 m_Matrix3.set(m_Matrix3 mat) 
      m_Matrix3 m_Matrix3.setToRotation(float angle)
      Sets this matrix to a rotation matrix that will rotate any vector in counter clockwise order around the z-axis.
      m_Matrix3 m_Matrix3.setToScaling(float sx, float sy)
      Sets this matrix to a scaling matrix
      m_Matrix3 m_Matrix3.setToTranslation(float x, float y)
      Sets this matrix to a translation matrix.
